summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of North and East 63rd Street, from Meridian Avenue to Latona Avenue, by constructing concrete sidewalks all in accordance with Resolution No. 1172 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
